feed.title: Pinkary Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Pinkary: v1.43.0
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • fix: missing theme-switch's icon when value of theme is empty string, should set to default theme by @addeeandra in https://github.com/pinkary-project/pinkary.com/pull/627
  • fix: revert navs, use only backdrop-blur instead of light/dark bg by @addeeandra in https://github.com/pinkary-project/pinkary.com/pull/626
  • fix: light mode flickering, by adds theme on pre-render by @addeeandra in https://github.com/pinkary-project/pinkary.com/pull/625
  • Add .DS_Store to .gitignore by @yogesh16 in https://github.com/pinkary-project/pinkary.com/pull/624
  • Fix tests by changing the error message in NoBlankCharacters validation rule. by @ManukMinasyan in https://github.com/pinkary-project/pinkary.com/pull/629
  • For you to follow 453 by @msamgan in https://github.com/pinkary-project/pinkary.com/pull/600
  • Updated Social button redirect on profile by @pruthvi0728 in https://github.com/pinkary-project/pinkary.com/pull/632
  • Fix: 404 after deleting user by @MrPunyapal in https://github.com/pinkary-project/pinkary.com/pull/637
  • chore: improve-recent-query by @MrPunyapal in https://github.com/pinkary-project/pinkary.com/pull/643
  • Refactor TrendingQuestions to use simplePaginate instead of paginate by @MrPunyapal in https://github.com/pinkary-project/pinkary.com/pull/642
  • Refactor QuestionsFollowing.php to remove unused code by @MrPunyapal in https://github.com/pinkary-project/pinkary.com/pull/641
  • Feat: improve user purge by @MrPunyapal in https://github.com/pinkary-project/pinkary.com/pull/640
  • fixe word error on ArchTest file by changin test to arch by @Kepsondiaz in https://github.com/pinkary-project/pinkary.com/pull/639
  • fix: light-mode in following and followers popup at user's profile by @addeeandra in https://github.com/pinkary-project/pinkary.com/pull/636
  • Add space between dropdown links by @YilanBoy in https://github.com/pinkary-project/pinkary.com/pull/634
  • Theme switch label by @msamgan in https://github.com/pinkary-project/pinkary.com/pull/644
  • ui: theme switch with clearer visual cue by @addeeandra in https://github.com/pinkary-project/pinkary.com/pull/645
  • Refactor: theme switch logic and update theme initialization by @MrPunyapal in https://github.com/pinkary-project/pinkary.com/pull/646
  • fix: qr-code background's color in system-mode by @addeeandra in https://github.com/pinkary-project/pinkary.com/pull/647
  • Refactor: questions show by @MrPunyapal in https://github.com/pinkary-project/pinkary.com/pull/649
  • fix: added wire:key with parent div to fix morph issue. by @MrPunyapal in https://github.com/pinkary-project/pinkary.com/pull/651
  • Feat: threads in following by @MrPunyapal in https://github.com/pinkary-project/pinkary.com/pull/653
  • added ref=pinkary to all the outbound links from the profile page. by @msamgan in https://github.com/pinkary-project/pinkary.com/pull/652
  • Feat: easy follow by @MrPunyapal in https://github.com/pinkary-project/pinkary.com/pull/470
  • Refactor assertion in FollowingTest.php to fix incorrect variable usage by @MrPunyapal in https://github.com/pinkary-project/pinkary.com/pull/654
  • Refactor: follow button add wire keys by @MrPunyapal in https://github.com/pinkary-project/pinkary.com/pull/655
  • Feat: optimize feeds by @MrPunyapal in https://github.com/pinkary-project/pinkary.com/pull/658
  • Limit the answers length to 50 characters in page title by @akshit-arora in https://github.com/pinkary-project/pinkary.com/pull/665
  • enhanced the delete confirmation of the question. by @msamgan in https://github.com/pinkary-project/pinkary.com/pull/664
  • Fix: #656 Better handling of 'select' for autocomplete with no options by @steven-fox in https://github.com/pinkary-project/pinkary.com/pull/663
  • Fix: #582 Incorrect text to link parsing by @steven-fox in https://github.com/pinkary-project/pinkary.com/pull/662
  • fix: feed-speed by @MrPunyapal in https://github.com/pinkary-project/pinkary.com/pull/669
  • Feat: minor feed improvement by @MrPunyapal in https://github.com/pinkary-project/pinkary.com/pull/670
  • back button bug fix by @xeedev in https://github.com/pinkary-project/pinkary.com/pull/674
  • Fixes always showing "Follow me on Pinkary" when sharing another user by @xiCO2k in https://github.com/pinkary-project/pinkary.com/pull/678
  • Fix: Handle case where image markdown insert passes 1000 chars by @CamKem in https://github.com/pinkary-project/pinkary.com/pull/675
  • chore: link settings minor detail by @addeeandra in https://github.com/pinkary-project/pinkary.com/pull/677
  • chore: pagination's in light mode by @addeeandra in https://github.com/pinkary-project/pinkary.com/pull/676

New Contributors

  • @yogesh16 made their first contribution in https://github.com/pinkary-project/pinkary.com/pull/624
  • @pruthvi0728 made their first contribution in https://github.com/pinkary-project/pinkary.com/pull/632
  • @Kepsondiaz made their first contribution in https://github.com/pinkary-project/pinkary.com/pull/639
  • @YilanBoy made their first contribution in https://github.com/pinkary-project/pinkary.com/pull/634
  • @akshit-arora made their first contribution in https://github.com/pinkary-project/pinkary.com/pull/665
  • @xeedev made their first contribution in https://github.com/pinkary-project/pinkary.com/pull/674

Full Changelog: https://github.com/pinkary-project/pinkary.com/compare/v1.42.0...v1.43.0

entry.title: New release for Pinkary: v1.43.1
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • fix: nav being in front of things on wider displays by @brimmar in https://github.com/pinkary-project/pinkary.com/pull/681
  • Tweaks on bookmark button animation by @sjardim in https://github.com/pinkary-project/pinkary.com/pull/683
  • fix: typo on "Follow me/{name}" by @xiCO2k in https://github.com/pinkary-project/pinkary.com/pull/679
  • Feat: threads in profile by @MrPunyapal in https://github.com/pinkary-project/pinkary.com/pull/684
  • feat: usernames and links in bio by @MrPunyapal in https://github.com/pinkary-project/pinkary.com/pull/688
  • Refactor: UserResource to add delete action with confirmation by @MrPunyapal in https://github.com/pinkary-project/pinkary.com/pull/694
  • Add tests for user deletion functionality by @MrPunyapal in https://github.com/pinkary-project/pinkary.com/pull/695
  • Fix: handle whitespace issue in codeblocks by @ShetlandJ in https://github.com/pinkary-project/pinkary.com/pull/693
  • Adds a test for the optimizeImage function with an image that includes multiple frames so that overall code coverage is 100% by @carlos-granados in https://github.com/pinkary-project/pinkary.com/pull/691
  • feat: following-feed-speed by @MrPunyapal in https://github.com/pinkary-project/pinkary.com/pull/697

New Contributors

  • @brimmar made their first contribution in https://github.com/pinkary-project/pinkary.com/pull/681
  • @sjardim made their first contribution in https://github.com/pinkary-project/pinkary.com/pull/683
  • @ShetlandJ made their first contribution in https://github.com/pinkary-project/pinkary.com/pull/693
  • @carlos-granados made their first contribution in https://github.com/pinkary-project/pinkary.com/pull/691

Full Changelog: https://github.com/pinkary-project/pinkary.com/compare/v1.43.0...v1.43.1

entry.title: New release for Pinkary: 1.44.0
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Feat: following-feed-speed by @MrPunyapal in https://github.com/pinkary-project/pinkary.com/pull/700
  • [wip] Feat: pan-in-admin by @MrPunyapal in https://github.com/pinkary-project/pinkary.com/pull/706
  • Feature: page that explains what's verified and how to get verified by @itsonlyjeff in https://github.com/pinkary-project/pinkary.com/pull/708
  • Feat: pan in admin by @MrPunyapal in https://github.com/pinkary-project/pinkary.com/pull/707
  • Chore: questions query improvement by @MrPunyapal in https://github.com/pinkary-project/pinkary.com/pull/705
  • fix: overflowing issue when opening the last dropdown menu by @brimmar in https://github.com/pinkary-project/pinkary.com/pull/704
  • fix: mentions list not showing on the edit mode by @brimmar in https://github.com/pinkary-project/pinkary.com/pull/703
  • Improve consistent design on verified page for light and dark mode, and refactor Alpine.js code for better clarity by @nunowar in https://github.com/pinkary-project/pinkary.com/pull/709
  • WIP by @MrPunyapal in https://github.com/pinkary-project/pinkary.com/pull/711
  • Update vite dependency to version 5.4.6 by @MrPunyapal in https://github.com/pinkary-project/pinkary.com/pull/714
  • Feat: Link Previews (OG Images & Video + oEmbed Videos & Tweets) by @CamKem in https://github.com/pinkary-project/pinkary.com/pull/715
  • Refactor model relationship annotations to use 'covariant $this' by @bnzo in https://github.com/pinkary-project/pinkary.com/pull/718
  • Fix/link preview tests related errors by @MrPunyapal in https://github.com/pinkary-project/pinkary.com/pull/721
  • Feat: light mode in question's placeholder by @MrPunyapal in https://github.com/pinkary-project/pinkary.com/pull/723
  • test: enhance HTTP fake responses and add metadata parsing tests by @MrPunyapal in https://github.com/pinkary-project/pinkary.com/pull/722
  • fix: update regex to include
    tags in hashtag parsing by @MrPunyapal in https://github.com/pinkary-project/pinkary.com/pull/724
  • Chore: fix link preview by @MrPunyapal in https://github.com/pinkary-project/pinkary.com/pull/725
  • Update MentionProviderParsable.php by @MrPunyapal in https://github.com/pinkary-project/pinkary.com/pull/726
  • Fix: remove tweet oEmbed previews by @CamKem in https://github.com/pinkary-project/pinkary.com/pull/727
  • Removed useless casts for default timestamps by @siarheipashkevich in https://github.com/pinkary-project/pinkary.com/pull/731
  • Fix: Add Existence & image size check + add Twitterbot user-agent for x.com by @CamKem in https://github.com/pinkary-project/pinkary.com/pull/729
  • chore(deps): bump symfony/http-client from 7.1.7 to 7.1.8 by @dependabot[bot] in https://github.com/pinkary-project/pinkary.com/pull/734
  • Fix: image security by @CamKem in https://github.com/pinkary-project/pinkary.com/pull/735
  • Fix: Method visibility - optimizeImages by @CamKem in https://github.com/pinkary-project/pinkary.com/pull/736
  • Fix: Client side delete images causes 500 error by @CamKem in https://github.com/pinkary-project/pinkary.com/pull/750
  • fix(casts): change 'pinned' cast type from bool to boolean by @VincentMukuna in https://github.com/pinkary-project/pinkary.com/pull/743
  • Fix: Parse URL's via Tokenization by @CamKem in https://github.com/pinkary-project/pinkary.com/pull/749
  • feat: migrate from Google reCAPTCHA to Cloudflare Turnstile for bot protection by @ozdemirrulass in https://github.com/pinkary-project/pinkary.com/pull/742
  • Make "Bio" field not required by @carlos-granados in https://github.com/pinkary-project/pinkary.com/pull/701
  • Feat: actions for Email verified users by @MrPunyapal in https://github.com/pinkary-project/pinkary.com/pull/741
  • Feat: phpstan and rector 2.o by @MrPunyapal in https://github.com/pinkary-project/pinkary.com/pull/752
  • Tests: for verified actions by @MrPunyapal in https://github.com/pinkary-project/pinkary.com/pull/751
  • Feat: add translate button by @MrPunyapal in https://github.com/pinkary-project/pinkary.com/pull/754
  • Fix: Youtube Previews by @CamKem in https://github.com/pinkary-project/pinkary.com/pull/756
  • Fix: Only last url to have preview per post by @CamKem in https://github.com/pinkary-project/pinkary.com/pull/757
  • refactor: use blade directive in text-input by @alisalehi1380 in https://github.com/pinkary-project/pinkary.com/pull/753
  • Chore: Running update to multibyte functions when running pint. by @CamKem in https://github.com/pinkary-project/pinkary.com/pull/763
  • Revert "Chore: Running update to multibyte functions when running pint." by @MrPunyapal in https://github.com/pinkary-project/pinkary.com/pull/764
  • Fix: like and bookmark buttons with back key by @MrPunyapal in https://github.com/pinkary-project/pinkary.com/pull/768
  • Update type hints in model docblocks to use $this instead of covariant $this by @bnzo in https://github.com/pinkary-project/pinkary.com/pull/766
  • Feat: Pest v4 by @MrPunyapal in https://github.com/pinkary-project/pinkary.com/pull/770
  • Add 'Asia/Calcutta' timezone alongside 'Asia/Kolkata' for better Intl compatibility by @tushar-nain in https://github.com/pinkary-project/pinkary.com/pull/774
  • Feat: pint parrallel and remove the type guard by @MrPunyapal in https://github.com/pinkary-project/pinkary.com/pull/777
  • chore: removes simplesoftwareio/simple-qrcode by @MrPunyapal in https://github.com/pinkary-project/pinkary.com/pull/781
  • Feat: polls by @MrPunyapal in https://github.com/pinkary-project/pinkary.com/pull/780

New Contributors

  • @itsonlyjeff made their first contribution in https://github.com/pinkary-project/pinkary.com/pull/708
  • @dependabot[bot] made their first contribution in https://github.com/pinkary-project/pinkary.com/pull/734
  • @VincentMukuna made their first contribution in https://github.com/pinkary-project/pinkary.com/pull/743
  • @alisalehi1380 made their first contribution in https://github.com/pinkary-project/pinkary.com/pull/753
  • @tushar-nain made their first contribution in https://github.com/pinkary-project/pinkary.com/pull/774

Full Changelog: https://github.com/pinkary-project/pinkary.com/compare/v1.43.1...v1.44.0

entry.title: New release for Pinkary: 1.45.0
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Feat: Laravel 12 by @MrPunyapal in https://github.com/pinkary-project/pinkary.com/pull/782
  • Update poll's button color on hover by @syofyanzuhad in https://github.com/pinkary-project/pinkary.com/pull/784
  • Feat: who liked my posts by @MrPunyapal in https://github.com/pinkary-project/pinkary.com/pull/786
  • Refactor: remove pulse by @MrPunyapal in https://github.com/pinkary-project/pinkary.com/pull/783
  • Datetime property definition fix by @bhanwarpsrathore in https://github.com/pinkary-project/pinkary.com/pull/776

New Contributors

  • @syofyanzuhad made their first contribution in https://github.com/pinkary-project/pinkary.com/pull/784
  • @bhanwarpsrathore made their first contribution in https://github.com/pinkary-project/pinkary.com/pull/776

Full Changelog: https://github.com/pinkary-project/pinkary.com/compare/v1.44.0...v1.45.0

entry.title: New release for Pinkary: 1.45.1
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Fix: link previews on mobile by @MrPunyapal in https://github.com/pinkary-project/pinkary.com/pull/788
  • fix: correct argument format for weekly notifications by @MrPunyapal in https://github.com/pinkary-project/pinkary.com/pull/790

Full Changelog: https://github.com/pinkary-project/pinkary.com/compare/v1.45.0...v1.45.1
